column4: hello, im using a 64bit version of ubuntu, and im installing the brother printer driver found here for 32 bit http://welcome.solutions.brother.com/bsc/public_s/id/linux/en/faq_prn.html#f00104   , when installing its installed a ton of i386 stuff, is this going to be an issue?
shouldn't harm, those are needed since brother offers no amd64-packages :(
any idea if there is anything i can do to get this printer driver added into the "add a printer" openprinting tool.
